QuestData.Title: Gurubashi Challenge
QuestData.Description: You've returned, $r. That means you've felt the call of the arena once more. Very well.$b$bTake this battle standard, $r, and place it down on the arena floor. Defeat the summoned combatant, then return to me.$b$bStay on your toes, $r. Anything goes inside the Gurubashi Arena.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place the Gurubashi Challenge Flag down inside the Battle Ring, then defeat the Gurubashi Arena Challenger.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $r! I look forward to seeing you fight again soon.
